A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went in having heard audiences weren't too impressed. (The audience score on MetaCritic is even worse than here). But nothing could have prepared me for HOW BAD this was!
As unoriginal as TFA was\, it was still a great movie and totally captured the spirit of the originals. But TLJ felt like a parody! 

Now I see why there's a PETITION to protest it on the Change website.

Google: "Henry Walsh" "Have Disney Strike Episode VIII from official Canon" and sign it! 
Disney won't do it of course but its a good way to send a message to them!
